title: Facebook user share in the United States 2019 , by gender
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of users for 2 number of Sexs.
The maximum Percentage of users 53.7 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Percentage of users is 46.3.
The difference of Percentage of users between the highest and lowest Sex is 7.4.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of users for 2 number of Sexs.
Sex Female has the highest Percentage of users and Male has the lowest Percentage of users.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of users for 2 number of Sexs.
The maximum Percentage of users 53.7 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Percentage of users is 46.3.
The difference of Percentage of users between the highest and lowest Sex is 7.4.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Percentage of users in each Sex on the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of users 53.7 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Percentage of users is 46.3.
The minimum Sex Male has got 1.16 times less Percentage of users than the maximum Sex Female.
The Sex Male tends to be 1.07 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Sexs, we get total 100.0.
